intro: Have fun and get scared in this co-op horror.
description:
Pacify, weaken and capture supernatural monsters by yourself or with friends in this fun co-op horror.

You just got hired at Paranormal Activity Helpers Incorporated (PAH Inc). It sounds corny, but the pay is great. They just want you to check out some allegedly haunted locations. You will most likely never be in any real danger, and they have tons of work right now. They even have room for a few more, if you have any friends that need a job. Start helping with the paranormal investigations today!

•Multiple unique missions 
Each level has its own unique monsters, lore, items and gameplay. Encounter a possessed girl in an old mansion, feed an insatiable farmer on an eerie farm, gather items and perform rituals to weaken a witch in the woods or even keep PAH headquarters safe during a power outage. Each mission is exciting, fun and terrifying.  

•A variety of paranormal beings
You may encounter possessed dolls, an invisible witch, shadow monsters stealing your items, and more. Learn how to avoid, pacify, weaken and capture the paranormal creatures. Then bring them back to PAH Inc for "research purposes".

•Single Player and Online Co-op Multiplayer
Go solo and take on the unnatural entities all by yourself or team up with friends online for some fun and exciting scares.

•Are you brave enough?
Pacify is built to get your adrenaline flowing. The environments are creepy and unsettling. The creatures are roaming around freely and interacting with the environment in different ways. Some monsters may not attack, some you can only hear, and others may charge at you on sight, take a bite or even change you into a supernatural being!

Start helping PAH Inc. today!
